entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, and he is being talked to by Hermione about blowing up his aunt.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who is scolding him for blowing up his aunt.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another friend of Harry's who is laughing at the situation.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person in authority who let Harry off for blowing up his aunt.

entities.name: aunt
entities.description: Harry's aunt was blown up by Harry.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Ron's mum would have killed him if he had blown up an aunt.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Ron's dad doesn't know why Fudge let Harry off.

relationships.description: Fudge let Harry off for blowing up his aunt.
